Help:Node.title: Command Usage: offer
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: $(keyword) [item] to [person]
EXAMPLE: $(keyword) sword to guard
Offers an item to a person; if the person "accepts" the item from you, it will be taken.
To see what items you are currently offering, type: offer
If you have been offered an item and want to take it, type: accept [item]
Note that the verb 'give' is a simple alias for the 'offer' verb, as you cannot ever give someone something; you can only offer it.
SEE ALSO: , ,
